name: Challenge Me: Brain Puzzles 2
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Give your mind a workout with more brain boggling puzzles!
  • 7 classic games like Sudoku, Towers, Number Soup & Squares
  • Infinite re-playability with most new games offering unique starting points
  • Track your success, monitor your progress on the bar chart in Challenge Mode
  • Over 1000 games to enjoy!
  • 4 profiles available offering enough save slots for the whole family
